definition: spleen and stomach (digestive organs in TCM)/preferences/one's taste (e.g. in literature)
to whet the appetite/appetizing/to amuse oneself at sb's expense/to tease
to spoil one's appetite/fig. to get fed up with sth

sentences.english: Protect the stomach and relieve the pain.
A：Yes, I have a terrible stomachache.
Objective To study the surgical treatment in massive hemorrhage of gastroduodenal ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胃十二指肠溃疡大出血的外科治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the role of enteral nutrition in the treatment of gastroparesis after abdominal operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肠内营养在腹部手术后胃瘫治疗中的作用。

sentences.english: Whatever you eat, leave space for ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 无论你吃什么，留点胃给冰激凌。

sentences.english: The use of gastric emptying rate of phenol red measured response in each group pyloric sphincter pressure in rats.
sentences.chinese: 利用酚红测胃排空率反应各组大鼠胃幽门括约肌压力。

sentences.english: The use of gastric emptying rate of phenol red measured response in each group pyloric sphincter pressure in rats.
sentences.chinese: 利用酚红测胃排空率反应各组大鼠胃幽门括约肌压力。

sentences.english: A betta's stomach is about the size of its eyeball, so take care not to feed your fish too much.
sentences.chinese: 斗鱼的胃和它的眼球大小相当，所以千万别喂的太多。

sentences.english: The gastroepiploic artery was used in 1 (1. 5% ) patient.
And never take your vitamins on an empty stomach.
sentences.chinese: 也不要空腹吃维生素，这会让胃不适。

sentences.english: Both collocation, warm stomach to get better effect.
sentences.chinese: 两者搭配，暖胃效果更佳。

sentences.english: The range of residual gastric volumes between study arms was similar.
sentences.chinese: 不同研究组组残余胃容量的范围是相似的。

sentences.english: Did you know? Seahorses have no teeth and no stomach.
The inferior and lateral convex border of the stomach is the greater curvature .
sentences.chinese: 胃的下方及侧面凸缘是胃大弯。

sentences.english: Stomach is composed of two parts, the cardiac and pyloric region, at the first stage of mysis.
sentences.chinese: 在糠虾幼虫第一期，胃分为贲门胃和幽门胃两部分。

sentences.english: Stomach is composed of two parts, the cardiac and pyloric region, at the first stage of mysis.
sentences.chinese: 在糠虾幼虫第一期，胃分为贲门胃和幽门胃两部分。
